EmailTemplate.name: Backorder IAM Email EN 1.Backorder IAM EN 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Disinfecting Wipes Remain on Backorder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
Thank you for your patience, but due to the on-going supply shortage, your order of disinfecting wipes remains on backorder. Even though pre-moistened disinfecting wipes are currently unavailable, we do have alternative products such as sprays and wipers that are in stock, and when paired together, meet or exceed the power of a wipe.
Here are a couple of disinfecting sprays that I highly recommend:
- zytec Germ Buster Disinfectant Trigger Spray <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/1264-0_zytec_Germ_Buster_Disinfectant_Trigger_Spray_Bottle%2c_946_mL.aspx?cmp=EBIAMBACKORDEREN1&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> - kills 99.9% of viruses and bacteria
- Highmark All Purpose Disinfectant Cleaner <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/98918_Highmark_All_Purpose_Disinfectant_Cleaner%2c_Ready-to-Use_Spray%2c_740_mL.aspx?cmp=EBIAMBACKORDEREN1&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> - this is a great cleaner for everyday maintenance
For ease of use, I suggest pairing these sprays with wipers as they have superior strength, durability, and absorbency compared to using a regular paper towel. Here are a couple I recommend:
- EasyTask Centerfeed Spunlace Wipers <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/N-A105CZGW_EasyTask_Centerfeed_Spunlace_Wipers_with_GrabBox%2c_White%2c_275_SheetsRL.aspx?cmp=EBIAMBACKORDEREN1&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
- Cascades Pro Tuff All Purpose Paper Wipers <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/CAS-W100_Cascades_PRO_Tuff-Job_2-Ply_14_Fold_All-Purpose_Paper_Wipers%2c_Brown%2c_800_WipersCT.aspx?mode=direct&?cmp=EBIAMBACKORDEREN1&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
If you decide to purchase these alternative solutions and would like to cancel your disinfecting wipes backorder, please respond to this email. Kindly let me know if there is anything else I can do for you.
Best Regards,
